channel.title: Fixed!

item.title: Fixed!
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

Hi, I decided just to recycle this thread again. I came across another problem where I cannot walk or anything. Here’s what I added under public boolean wear():

if(wearID == 7433){ setAnimation(1501); playerSE = 1500; playerSEW = 1501; playerSER = 1501; playerSEA = 1501; }
I grabbed the code from someone’s tut I found while searching this a bit more…

I tested it and it does the animation but I just cant walk around or anything… Help?

EDIT: Fixed! All I did was remove the setAnimation line and it worked. Woot!

Read full topic
